value.title: Uber exits self-driving car sector, sells business to Aurora
value.excerpt: Uber will invest in Aurora to help bring the technology to life and benefit from Aurora's expected progress in the future.

value.title: Amazon’s self-driving Zoox vehicle spotted ahead of next week’s reveal
value.excerpt: The first vehicle from Amazon-owned self-driving startup Zoox has been spotted on the streets of San Francisco ahead of its reveal next week.

value.title: Elon Musk makes clear his stance on self-driving cars, AI oversight, and his 'ad for Mars'
value.excerpt: In a recent interview, Musk discussed his thoughts on a self-driving car revolution, government oversight on AI, and his timeline to get into space.

value.title: The Impassioned Debate: Self-Driving Cars Parking Head-In Versus Nose Out
value.excerpt: Human drivers aren't sure whether to park heading in or via backing in, which turns out to be an issue for self-driving cars too.

value.title: Tesla cuts Full Self-Driving upgrade price by $1,000 for some customers
value.excerpt: Tesla has cut the price of a Full Self Driving upgrade by $1,000, but only for people with Enhanced Autopilot-equipped cars.

value.title: This 25-year-old is now a billionaire, after his self-driving car company Luminar went public
value.excerpt: Austin Russell founded Luminar Technologies in 2012 and joins a short list of people who have amassed a billion-dollar fortune before the age of 30

value.title: Improving ophthalmologic care through artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: For some, hearing the words artificial intelligence, or AI, sparks imaginative scenes of robot overlords, self-driving cars, dystopian surveillance, chatbots, and machines replacing humans at work.

value.title: Self-Driving Cars Being Tailgated By Obnoxious Human Drivers
value.excerpt: Human drivers tailgate self-driving cars, but this bodes for big trouble. getty. Let’s talk about those obnoxious people that insist on driving their car as though it is an exte

value.title: AutoX’s robo-taxi service in Shenzhen leaves out the human driver
value.excerpt: AutoX, a China-based startup developing self-driving cars, has launched a fully driverless taxi service in Shenzhen.

value.title: AWS DeepRacer trains and engages tens of thousands of people on machine learning
value.excerpt: Ever since the launch of Amazon Web Services Inc.’s DeepRacer in 2018, tens of thousands of developers from around the world have been getting hands-on experience with reinforcement learning in the AWS Management Console by building their AWS DeepRacer models and competing in the AWS DeepRacer League for a chance to be crowned the AWS DeepRacer League Champion at Amazon’s yearly re:Invent conference.

value.title: Automakers unveil proposals to speed U.S. self-driving deployment
value.excerpt: A group representing major automakers is unveiling a detailed proposal Wednesday aimed at making it easier to deploy thousands of self-driving vehicles in the coming years, according to a document seen by Reuters.

value.title: What’s around the turn in 2021? AWS DeepRacer League announces new divisions, rewards, and community leagues
value.excerpt: AWS DeepRacer allows you to get hands on with machine learning (ML) through a fully autonomous 1/18th scale race car driven by reinforcement learning, a 3D racing simulator on the AWS DeepRacer console, a global racing league, and hundreds of customer-initiated community races. value.title: Waymo self-driving cars set out for Ohio snow at new testing facility
value.excerpt: Alphabet's Waymo division is ready to take on the Buckeye State as it announced on Tuesday a new facility in East Liberty, Ohio, to house its self-driving car prototypes. There, Waymo plans to put its Waymo Driver system to work on driving a car entirely by itself,

value.title: 7 Machine Learning Stocks for a Smarter Future
value.excerpt: Machine learning is a subset of AI (Artificial Intelligence). It’s about using sophisticated algorithms to find patterns in large amounts of data. Note that machine learning is far from new.

value.title: As Algorithms Take Over More of the Economy, We Should Cede Control (Very) Carefully

value.title: Baidu, CyberArk, Sony, Microsoft and Nintendo as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
value.excerpt: Zacks Equity Research highlights Baidu BIDU as the Bull of the Day and CyberArk Software CYBR as the Bear of the Day. In addition, Zacks Equity Research provides analysis on Sony Corp. SNE, Microsoft MSFT and Nintendo Co.

value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla Full Self-Driving beta to expand in two weeks
value.excerpt: More Tesla drivers could soon be sharing warts-and-all videos of Full-Self Driving in action on public streets.

value.title: Bull of the Day: Baidu (BIDU)
value.excerpt: After peaking above $270 in 2018, Baidu (BIDU) shares have been stuck in bull market purgatory, spending most of the last 18 months under $140. That punishment could be ending soon as the company reinvents itself and recovers from government restrictions on its advertising revenues.

value.title: Volvo Designs Driving Simulator Using Video Game Engine To Train Autonomous Vehicles
value.excerpt: More autonomous vehicle researchers and engineers are turning to video games to enhance the performance and reliability of autonomous vehicles. According to TNW, Volvo has begun to utilize video games to assist in the development of autonomous vehicles and the AI algorithms that will drive them.

value.title: Tesla could widen release of 'self-driving' software in two weeks
value.excerpt: Tesla Inc Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said on Friday there will probably be a wider roll out of a new "Full Self Driving" software update in two weeks.

value.title: Volvo thinks gaming tech can help make self-driving cars safer
value.excerpt: Volvo is using video game tech like VR headsets, simulations, and haptic feedback steering wheels to create a driving simulator to help make cars safer.

value.title: Tesla’s air suspension work for Full Self-Driving will be a killer Cybertruck feature

value.title: WeRide robotaxis gain loyal passengers but fixed pick-up, drop-off spots irk some, survey shows
value.excerpt: Nearly 60 per cent of about 650 passengers WeRide surveyed say they use the company’s robotaxi service for regular commutes.

value.title: Artificial intelligence could put Milton Keynes on a par with San Francisco and Singapore
value.excerpt: MK has the world’s largest fleet of autonomous delivery robots and was the UK partner for a three-year trial of driverless autonomous vehicles. In the last year alone, Santander’s has begun its £150m investment into a new innovation centre in Central ...

value.title: California paves way to let self-driving taxis charge for rides
value.excerpt: Regulators in California have developed two programs that will allow and permit self-driving taxis to charge their passengers for rides.
